text: Learning Objectives â€¢ Describe linear regression and fit linear models to observed data â€¢ Build equations for simple linear regression and multiple regression â€¢ Calculate and interpret standard error of the estimate (sy|x) â€¢ Contrast r, r2, R, and R2 1 Regression is making predictions â€¢ How does Youtube decide what video to show next? â€¢ How does Netflix know how well Iâ€™ll like a movie Iâ€™ve never seen? â€¢ What is machine learning?
